item.title: Mentioned by Ottawa Citizen
item.description:
Letter: Assessment off-base
Deepak Obhrai, parliamentary secretary to the minister of foreign affairs, is, I believe, off base in his assessment of Brian Davis, former Canadian Ambassador to Syria. Not only does he fail to address the main points in Davis' letter, he actually claims that ...

item.title: Mentioned by Ottawa Citizen
item.description:
Davis unrealistic on Israel
By Deepak Obhrai, Ottawa Citizen March 13, 2013. Tweet. Comment. 0. Re: Whipping beaten people, March 11. Retired diplomat Brian Davis' take on Canada's foreign policy approach is not rooted in reality. Our government stands for what is principled and ...
